```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load the data 538

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```


```{r}
donation_df<-read_csv("sports-political-donations.csv")

donation_df
```
```{r}
donation_df$Amount = parse_number(donation_df$Amount)

donation_df
```


```{r}
donations_by_party <- donation_df |> 
  group_by(Party) |> 
  summarize(total = sum(Amount)) |> 
  arrange(desc(total))

donations_by_party
```
